title: JPEG.Recovery.Pro.v4.0.Incl.Work.Serial.rar
description:
JPEG Recovery Pro v4.0
Language:English OS:Win2000/XP/2003
WEB:http://www.hketech.com/


JPEG Recovery is a useful and handy tool that can repair corrupted JPEG picture or photo which is restored by a photo or data recovery software. JPEG Recovery support combining 2 JPEG pictures for recovery, just in case the original picture was split into 2 files by the photo or data recovery software.

 Here are some key features of "JPEG Recovery":

JPEG Photo RecoveryÃƒâ€šÃ‚Â· Support removing unwanted garbage in JPEG picture which are introduced during card/disk recovery processing. Auto DetectÃƒâ€šÃ‚Â· Auto suggest to repair a JPEG picture if there are suspected illegal JPEG encodings.
      Recover a Photo if it is Split into 2 or more Files Ãƒâ€šÃ‚Â· In some occasions, the photo recovery software would separate a photo in 2 different files. JPEG Recovery supports accepting 2 files and remove the unwanted portion.  Easy to Use
 Ãƒâ€šÃ‚Â· Just click the starting and ending points of the unwanted portion. The system will then automatically remove it.
 Remove Multiple Portion
 Ãƒâ€šÃ‚Â· You may remove multiple portions within a picture. There is no limitation on how many portions to be removed.Unlimited Undo and Redo Ãƒâ€šÃ‚Â· You may undo or redo any action. There is no limit on the number of undo and redo. Retain all Data in the Picture Ãƒâ€šÃ‚Â· All data (e.g. Exif) will be retained in the saved image. Only the unwanted portion(s) is removed.
